name: Wigwam Synchroknit Snow Junkie Lightweight Ski Socks - Unisex
categories: Synchroknit Snow Junkie Lightweight Ski Socks
description: A classic sock for shredding powder. Snug fitting, fully cushioned and made with wool to provide warmth and comfort for long days in your boots.SynchroKnit™ fabric has variable thickness for durability and comfort.Heel and toe bands hold socks in place.Reinforced cushion on heel, toe and shin protect against hot spots.Seamless toe closure for comfort.
